titleStmt.title: Curious enquiries being six brief discourses.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: "Viz. I Of the longitude, II. The tricks of astrological quacks, III. Of the depth of the sea, IV. Of tabacco, V. Of Europes being too full of people, VI. The various opinions concerning the time of keeping the Sabbath."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
